title: Slogan-Based Engineering Education Improvement Program

context.additional_context: Online course for job seekers that concisely organizes core engineering concepts and strengthens creative thinking skills.

learning_goals: Learners can summarize and express engineering terminology into catchphrases within 10 characters
Learners can select and vote for 5–10 outstanding catchphrases through peer evaluation
Learners can analyze and utilize the top 7 weekly catchphrases and 2–3 instructor-recommended special awards
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
